subject: Suite 3 Design Premium
body:
Nothing lowers the level on conversation more than raising the voice.
The ancestor of every action is thought.
Discipline is not a nasty word.
Life would be tolerable but for its amusements.
Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
A thing is worth what it can do for you, not what you choose to pay for it.
Comedy deflates the sense precisely so that the underlying lubricity and malice may bubble to the surface.
Those who commit injustice bear the greatest burden.
Never ask the Gods for life set free from grief, but ask for courage that endureth long.
The first thing that strikes a visitor to Paris is a taxi.
The hand that rocks the cradle rules the nation and its destiny.
The Metropolis should have been aborted long before it became New York, London or Tokyo.
To be happy, we must be true to nature, and carry our age along with us.
What I like about cities is that everything is king size, the beauty and the ugliness.
If you do not the expect the unexpected you will not find it, for it is not to be reached by search or trail.
Artists are, above all, men who want to become inhuman.
The words of my book nothing, the drift of it everything.
Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
Art is good when it springs from necessity. This kind of origin is the guarantee of its value there is no other.
